name: @p01/circuits
description: Zero-knowledge circuits for Protocol 01 shielded transactions

scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup build/transfer.r1cs pot20_final.ptau build/transfer_0000.zkey
scripts.contribute: snarkjs zkey contribute build/transfer_0000.zkey build/transfer_0001.zkey --name="First contribution" -v
scripts.finalize: snarkjs zkey beacon build/transfer_0001.zkey build/transfer_final.zkey 0102030405060708090a0b0c0d0e0f101112131415161718191a1b1c1d1e1f 10 -n="Final Beacon phase2"
scripts.export-vk: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/transfer_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.export-solidity: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/transfer_final.zkey build/verifier.sol
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run setup && npm run contribute && npm run finalize && npm run export-vk

author: Protocol 01 Team
